headline: Jim Cramer on Loews Corporation: “Good Opportunity Here”
summary: Loews Corporation (NYSE:L) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer shed light on. Cramer highlighted the company’s valuation and earnings growth, as he stated: “Good opportunity here… This is an enigma. It’s the only company in the S&P 500 that has zero analyst coverage… Lately, the company’s been doing a great job of growing intrinsic […]
